title: Caroline Spelman – 2012 Speech at Climate Change Risk Assessment Launch
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Caroline Spelman, the then Secretary of State for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs, at the Climate Change Risk Assessment Launch on 30 January 2012.
